failedtoloadicon: Failed to load the icon you have set in your configuration.({User_Icon})
filelist: Retrieving list of files to download..
filecount: There are {File_Count} files to compare with your current files.
notallowed: The file "{FileName}" could not be downloaded because it is not on your allowed list, skipping the file.
skipfile: Skipping "{FileName}", your version of this file is up-to-date.
downloadfile: A newer version of "{FileName}" is available, downloading now..
errordownloadingfile: There was an error downloading the file "{FileName}".
fullclientfail: Failed to download the full client.
install_error: There was an error installing the client.
install_location: Full client downloaded, where would you like to install?
download_full_client: Attempting to download the full client..
full_client_not_offered: This server does not provide the full client.
choose_ultima_dir: You must choose your ultima online directory.
error_reading_config: There was an error reading your config file.
failed_to_load_browser: Failed to open your web browser.
error_connecting_to_server: There was an error conecting to the server to check for updates.
connecting_to_server: Connecting to server to check for updates..
file_list_fail: There was an error retrieving the file list.
update_your_kiru: Your server is using MyKiru {Server_Kiru_Version}, you are using MyKiru {Client_Kiru_Version}. To continue, you need to download MyKiru {Server_Kiru_Version} from http://uokiru.com(MyKiru->UOKiru.com).
